text: Nahakna nahakki maiyokta naral siriba mahakka wayelsangda chatpa matamda, nahakna wayelsang youdringeida yetnaba adu yariba makei yasinnanaba nahakna ngamjaba adu hotnou. Adu nattragadi mahakna nahakpu wayel mapugi mangda chingthokpa yai aduga mahakna nangbu phamnaibada sinnagani aduga nahakpu keisumsangda thajingani.
